intents.name: riddles
responses: What has four legs in the morning, two legs at noon, and three legs in the evening? 🕵️‍♂️
I am always hungry, I must always be fed. The thing I touch will soon turn red. What am I? 🔥
What comes once in a minute, twice in a moment, but never in a thousand years? 🤔
The more of me you take, the more you leave behind. What am I? 👣
